name: Entocycle
headline: Automated factory to produce insect protein for farm animals.
description:
The Insect Farming Company.

We’re developing the world’s most efficient and sustainable way to produce protein.

Insects are rich in protein and are a natural component of the diets of many fish and free-range poultry.

Our technology is significantly more efficient at producing protein than traditional methods of production as our insects are vertically farmed and not restricted to floor space or area.

Thanks to our automated system we can produce at industrial scale and offer farmers a cost-effective and sustainable alternative to soymeal and fishmeal.

# Smart insect farming technology
[ Learn more ](https://www.entocycle.com/<#solutions>)
Who our insect farming technology helps
  * ![A insect farm operator inspecting black soldier fly larvae.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/4b51f38a-5b02-4d57-9c48-afbb93fa4f48/Entocycle-Growth-Units-5-%281920%29.jpg?format=500w)
## Farmers
Our insect farms offer diversification into new and fast-growing markets, helping secure a sustainable future for your farm business.
[ Learn more ](https://www.entocycle.com/</solutions/farmers>)
  * ![Black soldier flies in a cage](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/684a35ea-ce80-4994-8101-052561dd93c6/Entocycle-BSF-flies-in-fly-room-1920-%28for-web%29.jpg?format=500w)
## Insect companies
Our technological solutions include machine vision and automation to reduce operational costs and increase productivity in black soldier fly farms. 
[ Learn more ](https://www.entocycle.com/</solutions/insect-companies>)
  * ![Waste management](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/2f1a1b73-6090-4c59-9833-4a0ede6215c9/Entocycle-BSF-larvae-in-crate-1920-%28for-web%29.jpg?format=500w)
## Waste management
Our insect farms utilise black soldier fly bio-conversion to process food by-products and agricultural waste into a low-carbon protein for use in pet food and livestock feed.
[ Learn more ](https://www.entocycle.com/</solutions/waste-management>)
  * ## Food companies
Reduce your company’s environmental footprint and meet Net Zero targets by using our insect farm to supply a sustainable and protein-rich ingredient for poultry or pig diets.
[ Learn more ](https://www.entocycle.com/</solutions/food-companies>)


Item 1 of 4
What we do
  * ![Complete insect farm icon](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/704620e3-85a8-4b22-a814-26bf17bea4f5/ENTOCYCLE-INSECT-FARM-GRAPHIC-POSITIVE.png)
## Complete insect farm
Our complete insect farm turns food waste and byproducts into valuable low-carbon resources for your business.
[Learn more](https://www.entocycle.com/</complete-insect-farm>)
  * ![Insect technology icon](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/a6852b15-83f1-4f00-8bc5-a1a547e1d1f5/ENTOCYCLE-ENTOSIGHT-GRAPHIC-POSITIVE.png)
## Insect technology
Our proprietary technology delivers precision and reliability throughout the black soldier fly larvae production process.
[Learn more](https://www.entocycle.com/</insect-farming-technology>)
  * ![Insect engineering services icon](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/c4aaea11-2bfd-4cef-8975-2300d815ad76/ENTOCYCLE-ENTOEXPLORE-GRAPHICS-POSITIVE.png)
## Insect engineering services
Our entomologists, engineers and advisors bring experience, expertise and innovation to your insect project.
[Learn more](https://www.entocycle.com/</insect-engineering-services>)


![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/635a8ce13daff54c9f1b0e76/d6349803-f17c-441d-9f70-0ce5ffa091f8/Complete-farm-graphic-for-slides.png)
Customer Spotlight
  * ## “We recently trialled Entocycle’s optical dosing solution, Entosight Neo, and the results demonstrated a substantial improvement in dosing accuracy. They’re also a great team to work with, not only due to their technical expertise, but their willingness to consider our unique needs and operations.”
Liz Koutsos, President of EnviroFlight
  * ## “A big thank you to the entire team for delivering such an amazing piece of kit. The flexibility of systems and adjustability of various aspects are just brilliant and the unit has a super-easy user interface. Pure genius!”
Dr. Gesa Reiss, SMART Agri-Systems Senior Innovation Fellow, University of Leeds
  * ## “Entocycle have demonstrated that they are best-in-class for building BSF breeding systems and they have a team of experts who are always a pleasure to work with.”
Ani Vallabhaneni, Co-founder, Sanergy

generated_description:
Entocycle is a pioneering company based in London, UK, focused on revolutionizing protein production through insect farming. Originally launched as The Insect Farming Company, they are now on a mission to create automated factories for producing insect protein on an industrial scale. This protein is particularly important for livestock, as insects are a natural dietary source for fish and free-range poultry.

Here's their pitch: insects are not just a sustainable option; they are incredibly efficient compared to traditional protein sources like soy and fishmeal. Thanks to their vertically farmed, automated systems, Entocycle leverages space and technology to produce protein more efficiently than ever. This innovation not only offers a cost-effective alternative for farmers but also supports environmental sustainability.

Entocycle was founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch S17 and is helmed by a dedicated team of 13. They provide a range of services, including complete insect farm solutions, insect engineering, and feedstock trials. Their technologies utilize black soldier fly larvae to convert food waste and agricultural byproducts into low-carbon protein, offering an eco-friendly solution that aligns with net-zero targets for businesses.

The emphasis on their technology and process positions them at the intersection of food tech and agriculture, responding to the growing demand for sustainable food production. The company actively supports farmers, insect companies, waste management solutions, and food firms by diversifying their operations and enhancing productivity.

In short, Entocycle is not just about breeding insects—it's about rethinking how we produce protein sustainably and innovatively. Their commitment to insect welfare and technological advancement ensures they are at the forefront of transforming the agricultural landscape.

To learn more about their innovative solutions, you can visit their website at [Entocycle](https://www.entocycle.com/).
